design.appearanceSpecification: The landing page should have a clean and fresh aesthetic, using a color palette dominated by yellow and green. A prominent banana image should be at the top, with clear, readable text about bananas. Buttons should be easily tappable with a simple, rounded design.
design.blueprint:
- Header:
  - Applet Title: "All About Bananas"
- Hero Section:
  - Large, appealing image of a banana.
  - Catchy headline: "Discover the Wonderful World of Bananas!"
  - Brief introductory text about bananas.
- Features Section:
  - Section Title: "Why Bananas are Great"
  - List of key features/benefits of bananas (e.g., "Rich in Potassium", "Great for Energy", "Versatile Fruit").
  - Each feature could have a small icon.
- Call to Action Section:
  - Button: "Learn More"
  - Button: "Find Banana Recipes"
design.functionalitySpecification: The landing page will serve as an informational hub about bananas. Users will land on the page and see an attractive image and headline. They can then read a brief introduction and a list of key benefits. Tapping the 'Learn More' button will likely navigate to a more detailed page (if available in a larger app context) or expand the current content. Tapping the 'Find Banana Recipes' button will navigate to a recipe section or external site.
